DOC.brief_summary: Patients who underwent laparoscopic repair of large hiatal hernias and anterior fundoplication with mesh are examined for their recurrence rate one year after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Recurrence Rate After Laparoscopic Repair of Large Hiatal Hernia
DOC.criteria: Age older than 18 years Initially suffering from large hiatal hernia (>20% of the stomach in the thoracic cavity) Performance of laparoscopic hiatal hernia repair with mesh and anterior fundoplication Informed Consent as documented by signature (Appendix: Informed Consent Form) Performance of any other antireflux surgery such as Toupet or Nissenfundoplication Performance of anterior fundoplication without mesh Women who meet the inclusion criteria but are pregnant or breast feeding or have the intention to become pregnant during the course of the study
